auth.login.title: Log in to your account
auth.login.description: Enter your email and password below to log in
auth.register.title: Create an account
auth.register.description: Enter your details below to create your account
auth.register.name: Name
auth.forgot.title: Forgot Password
auth.forgot.description: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.
auth.reset.title: Reset Password
auth.verify.title: Email Verification
auth.verify.description: Thanks for signing up! Before getting started, could you verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you? If you didn't receive the email, we will gladly send you another.
auth.verify.sent: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.
dashboard.title: Dashboard
settings.profile.title: Profile Information
settings.profile.description: Update your account's profile information and email address.
settings.profile.name: Name
settings.password.title: Update Password
settings.password.description: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure.
settings.appearance.title: Appearance
settings.appearance.description: Customize the appearance of the app. Automatically switch between day and night themes.
settings.delete.title: Delete Account
settings.delete.description: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information that you wish to retain.
settings.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your profile and account settings
settings.delete.warning_text: Please proceed with caution, this cannot be undone.
welcome.title: Welcome to Fenix
welcome.description: A modern web application built with Laravel and React.
welcome.feature1: Submit reports with description, category, geolocation and media.
welcome.feature2: See issues on the interactive map and track their status.
dashboard.toggle_view: Toggle between map and list view
map.geolocation_not_supported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser
map.location_required: Location access is required for the service to work
map.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this point?
map.add_point_description: Create a new point on the map
map.title: Title
map.delete_point_description: Are you sure you want to delete this point? This action cannot be undone.
map.error_wrong_format: Only JPEG and PNG formats are allowed
map.error_file_too_large: File size must be less than 5MB
